simulation

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • simulation.Simulation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Thread
    Simulation This class creates a thread to simulate the navigation route in Google Maps.
    Author:
    Skynet Team

    • Constructor Detail

      • Simulation

        public Simulation(MainUI ui,
                  Buzon<java.lang.String> buzon,
                  Resource r)
        The constructo set the needed varibles for the Simulation.
        Parameters:
        ui - MainUI ui is needed to print the route in the UI.
        buzon - Buzon buzon (mailbox) is needed to listen for new routes.
        r - Resource r is needed to change the location and state of the resource.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        The thread starts listening to the mailbox. When the thread receives a JSON, it parses it using "JSON" object, then sets the state of the resource and starts the simulation. The simulation will be stopped by the "Resource" thread if a route is received when the state is 1. If the simulation finishes the route to the incident, the incident will be resolved and the resource will be changed to the state 2. When the server receives the state 2 message, the server will send a JSON with the return home path.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • kill

        public void kill()

      • getDriving

        public boolean getDriving()
